properties.areaDesc: Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu; Manua
properties.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 15 at 7:52AM SBT by NWS Pago Pago AS
properties.description:
Gale force winds are possible to impact coastal waters of
American Samoa due to a combination of an active monsoon trough
and a developing Tropical Depression 04F (93P) passing south of
the Samoan islands. Model data show sustained winds up to 40
knots, with higher gusts, by Friday and into the weekend.

Strong winds can cause hazardous waves which could capsize or
damage vessels and reduce visibility.

Mariners should consider altering plans to avoid possible hazardous
conditions. Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or
secure the vessel for severe wind and seas.

NWSheadline: A Gale Watch is in effect for American Samoa coastal waters
